channel.title: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
channel.description:
the following is an error i got while trying to do ::master in my allstarscape server. its a totally basic allstar, and i made the skill caps 130 rather than 99, i compiled, did ::master.. and ERROR. did i miss somehting?
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=6048, tid=5672 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------

item.title: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
item.dc:creator: @Pina_Coladas Pina Coladas
item.description:
@Pina_Coladas wrote:

drubrkletern:

do you mean froze crashed? or like just shut down crashed?

shut down.

Read full topic
item.source: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

item.title: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

do you mean froze crashed? or like just shut down crashed?

Read full topic
item.source: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

item.title: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
item.dc:creator: @Pina_Coladas Pina Coladas
item.description:
@Pina_Coladas wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:2, topic:366596”]1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.
credits to locksmin
use the “application” not the “batch” file to play with your client[/quote]

thanks for the help…
but im afraid it still happened…
might be my fault for not explaining properly… the client runs fine, it just crashes once i tpyed the command. i made the batch into a application and ran the app, and still crashed.

any other ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

item.title: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

  1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.
credits to locksmin
use the “application” not the “batch” file to play with your client

Read full topic
item.source: A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
